directions: Blend the tomatillos, serrano chile peppers, and cilantro in a blender until smooth. Add 1 avocado quarter and continue blending until the avocado is fully incorporated into the mixture; repeat with each piece of avocado. Season with salt; continue processing until smooth. Serve immediately.
ingredients: 4 serrano chile peppers, or to taste
1 ripe avocado - peeled, pitted, and quartered
title: Spicy Avocado Sauce
